attributes.action: Ban the sale of chewing gum  and bubble gum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years now our streets and pavements have been strewn with discarded chewing gum. Until people can dispose of their chewing gum reasonably it should be banned from our country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Chewinggum/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
